name: clarification-needed
description: Supplier responds without pricing details â€” should clarify
supplierMessage:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out. We have several options available for the stainless steel water bottles. Pricing depends on the finish and cap style you choose. Could you send us your specific requirements? We can usually do competitive pricing for larger orders.

Best,
Ahmed
negotiationRules: Accept if price is below $8.00 per unit. Prefer 30-day payment terms.
escalationTriggers: Escalate if MOQ exceeds 500 units. Escalate if supplier mentions discontinuation.
